page.title: 06Watford: Scammells
page.content: Scammells is one of the biggest lorry manufacturers in Great Britian. Each lorry costs from Â£45000 to Â£150000. They send some of their lorries abroad to foreign countries but keep some of their lorries in Great Britian. Scammells also send some of their lorries to Iraq where a war is going on. The factory covers an area of 6.5 acres and employs 750 people. The factory is owned by British Leyland and produces 6 to 7 lorries a day. Scammell also produces vehicles for the Army. Their latest vehicle to go on the road is the Commander Tank Carrier.
